data.message: Why do we have a Giving Tuesday?  We give all year long!  The Local Jail Ministry, Undies for elementary age children, food pantries, etc.  There are needs every day!

replies.message: Hi there, Alda. #GivingTuesday is a global day dedicated to giving back. People use Facebook to raise awareness and support for causes they care about — and they motivate others to do the same. People raise money for disaster relief, they search for missing children, and they bring attention to the issues that are near and dear to their hearts. For Giving Tuesday, we wanted to remind people about the power of giving back. -Kate
